author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- removed the use of fwkJobReports parameter as that parameter has done nothing for years.
- change FwkJob to FwkTest to better reflect how it has been used for years.

NOTE: neither were removed from the _cfi files used outside of the tests as that could break existing configurations. Such a change will be done at a later date.

#### PR validation:

Relevant framework unit tests pass.
title: Updated MessageLogger tests to remove obsolete usages
